name: Adult Shadow Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walking, 40 ft. climbing, 80 ft. flying, 40 ft. swimming
description: The Adult Shadow Dragon is a massive dragon shrouded in darkness, embodying the essence of malevolence. Its scales are dark with shadowy hues, and it uses its environment to manipulate its foes, showcasing a control over shadows.
memorable: Its ability to pass through objects and its fear-inducing aura make it a terrifying presence on the battlefield.
goals: To exert control over its domain and instill fear in adventurers.
relations: Usually encountered in dark, twisted places, often with undead minions it creates.
environment: Shadowy areas, caves, or places tied to its essence link, particularly in low-light environments.
strengths: Immune to necrotic and poison damage; legendary resistance allows it to avoid harmful effects.
weaknesses: Susceptible to radiant damage, which diminishes its powers.
attacks: Employs a multiattack strategy with a powerful bite and claws, inflicting both piercing and necrotic damage, alongside a supernatural grasp that restrains foes.
most_powerful_ability: Anguished Breath, a devastating breath attack dealing massive necrotic damage and inflicting strife.
senses: It possesses darkvision up to 240 feet, allowing it to see clearly in darkness.
skills: Noteworthy skills in deception and stealth, making it a master ambusher and manipulator.
additional_information: Has incorporeal movement, allowing it to phase through solid objects.
Link to a specific area limits its ability to regain health.
Can become invisible in dim light or darkness, enhancing its ambushing capabilities.
Emits an Evil aura that can instill fear.
Capable of spellcasting, including creating magical darkness.
spellcasting: Innate spells include darkness, detect evil and good, bane, and create undead.
